name: Fajr
description: The Fajr prayer is the first of the five mandatory salah, to be performed anytime starting from the moment of dawn, but not after sunrise.

name: Dhuhr
description: The Dhuhr prayer is the Second of the five mandatory salah. Which we pray at noon.

name: Asr
description: The Asr  is the Third of the five mandatory salah. Which we pray in the afternoon.

name: Magrib
description: The Magrib prayer is the Fourth of the five mandatory salah. Which we pray after sunset.

name: Isha
description: The Isha prayer is the Fifth of the five mandatory salah. Which we pray at night.

name: Tahajjud
description: Tahajjud also known as the night prayer, is a voluntary prayer performed by followers of Islam.Which is prayed after one third of the night.

name: Quran Tilawat ,Morning
description: Every Muslim should have a strong connection to the Quran by building a strong relationship with it. This can only happen when you have a daily portion of Quran recitation.

name: Quran Tilawat ,Night
description: Every Muslim should have a strong connection to the Quran by building a strong relationship with it. This can only happen when you have a daily portion of Quran recitation.

name: Tosbi Tilawat, Any Time
description: Islam isn't just a religion. It is a complete way of life covering every spiritual, economic, and societal aspect. It establishes laws that lead its followers towards goodness and virtue.
